name: Shock Black Shoe Shine Sponge
description: Shock shoe polish has been created with a specially formulated expert dust shield formula, which protects shoes from dust, mud and water. With this unique formulation introduced in Sri Lanka for the first time, it undoubtedly surpasses all other shoe polish brands in the local market by offering an unmatched, long-lasting shine.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
